effect.x_y: Lowers the target’s evasion by one stage.

short_effect.x_y: Lowers the target’s evasion by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon’s evasiveness. This also lures wild Pokémon if used in places such as tall grass.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon’s evasiveness. This also lures wild Pokémon if used in places such as tall grass.
